blogPost.excerpt: BlueReceipt is Text Marketing Automation for Shopify Brands. It's like Mailchimp X Slack built around text messaging your customers. Popups, Automations, and Broadcasts in a powerful dashboard. Get our free starter plan and start in < 5 minutes!
blogPost.body: BlueReceipt is Text Marketing Automation for Shopify Brands. It's like Mailchimp X Slack built around text messaging your customers. Popups, Automations, and Broadcasts in a powerful dashboard. Get our free starter plan and start in < 5 minutes!
blogPost.title: BlueReceipt - Text marketing customers love ❤️
blogPost.author: Justin Mitchell

localize.description: BlueReceipt是Shopify品牌的文本营销自动化。它就像Mailchimp X Slack一样，围绕着给您的客户发送短信而建立。在一个强大的仪表板中实现弹出式、自动和广播。获取我们的免费入门计划，并在<5分钟内开始!
BlueReceipt是Shopify品牌的文本營銷自動化。它就像Mailchimp X Slack一樣，圍繞着給您的客戶發送短信而建立。在一個強大的儀表板中實現彈出式、自動和廣播。獲取我們的免費入門計劃，並在<5分鐘內開始!

previous.excerpt: Kaleidoscope 2.4 features a new powerful integration with the Xcode debugger. Send any debugger command (ksp) or object (kspo) output to Kaleidoscope. This enables iterating over common development tasks quickly.
previous.title: Kaleidoscope 2.4 - Compare debug output. Now with Xcode integration

localize.description: Kaleidoscope 2.4的特点是与Xcode调试器进行了新的强大集成。将任何调试器命令（ksp）或对象（kspo）输出发送到Kaleidoscope。这使其能够快速迭代常见的开发任务。
localize.tagline: 比较调试输出。现在与Xcode集成

localize.description: Kaleidoscope 2.4的特點是與Xcode調試器進行了新的強大集成。將任何調試器命令（ksp）或對象（kspo）輸出發送到Kaleidoscope。這使其能夠快速迭代常見的開發任務。
localize.tagline: 比較調試輸出。現在與Xcode集成

next.excerpt: Anicons is a pack of stylish and playful 3D icons that can be used instantly in your projects. The pack consists of 30 high-res, well-organized and commonly-used icons that can be customized easily.
next.title: Anicons - A pack of customizable 3D icons

localize.description: Anicons是一个时尚有趣的3D图标包，可以立即用于你的项目中。该包由30个高分辨率、井然有序、常用的图标组成，可以轻松定制。
Anicons是一個時尚有趣的3D圖標包，可以立即用於你的項目中。該包由30個高分辨率、井然有序、常用的圖標組成，可以輕鬆定製。
